David received his Computer Engineering degree and and Master in Applied Informatics from Pontif�cia Universidade Cat�lica do Paran� (2000), Pontif�cia Universidade Cat�lica do Paran� (2003), respectively, and hist PhD (in co-tutelle) in Informatics and Computer Science from Universit� Paris-Est Marne-la-Vall�e (2008) and Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG) (2008), respectively.
